Name: A Radical Conversation With...
Author: Matt Perez, Jose Leal, Luis Salas
Content: ...Luis Salas, Founder of Polymath, a company that has embarked on a mission to guide organizations through their Organizational Change and prepare them for the future. Mark your calendars and join hosts Matt Perez and Jose Leal as they explore the meaning of 'ambidextrous organizations', and what this means to the Radical World ethos.
